35

Giang So how did you become a sales manager in textiles?

Enzo Well, my family was always in textiles. My father had his own company in Bologna and I worked for him.

Giang Why did you leave?

Enzo Well, I went to university and I studied Business Management. Then I wanted to work abroad, so I left the family company and spent time in the United States.

Giang So when did you join your current company?

Enzo In two thousand and three.
